document_data.name: Lightning bug
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lightning bug''''' was an [[alteration]]/[[evocation]] [[spell]] that created a small mote of electricity that could shock an individual.
document_data.Effects: This spell was created as an amalgamation of the spells ''[[magic missile]]'' and ''[[shocking grasp]]''. When a ''lightning bug'' struck a person, or a similarly conductive material, it generated an electrical charge that increased depending on the skill and experience of the caster.
document_data.Casting: This spell only required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
document_data.History: ''Lightning bug'' was developed by [[Gemidan]], who served as apprentice to the original [[Blackstaff]] [[Khelben Arunsun]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. By the [[1368 DR|Year of the Banner, 1368 DR]], it was known by several of Gemidan's close friends and comrades and was made readily available to members of [[Waterdeep|Waterdeep's]] [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]] and [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]].
